hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.victim.report.VictimNoteSummary( victimNote, category, victim, victimName, (select victimOffender from omis.offender.domain.Offender victimOffender where victimOffender = victim), association, (select offenderAsOffender from omis.offender.domain.Offender as offenderAsOffender where offenderAsOffender = offender), offenderName ) from omis.victim.domain.VictimNote as victimNote inner join victimNote.category as category inner join victimNote.victim as victim inner join victim.name as victimName left outer join victimNote.association as association left outer join association.relationship as associationRelationship left outer join associationRelationship.firstPerson as offender left outer join offender.name as offenderName where victimNote.victim = :victim
